column3: You wish for <Highlight>StringParameter(1)</Highlight> to unlearn an ability? Very well, if you would be so kind as to specify the undesired ability...
Are you certain you wish for your race chocobo to unlearn <Sheet(ChocoboRaceAbility,IntegerParameter(2),0)/>?
And with that, the process is complete. I pray this meets with your satisfaction.
You wish for your race chocobo to unlearn an ability? Very well, if you would be so kind as to specify the undesired ability...
No, this cannot be right, can it? According to my records, you do not even have a registered race chocobo.
Race chocobos cannot unlearn abilities until they have been officially registered.
You did remember to bring a bottle of lethe water, did you not? If not, I fear we cannot proceed.
Abilities cannot be unlearned without lethe water, which can be purchased from the tack & feed trader at the race counter.
Hm. So far as I can tell, your race chocobo possesses no abilities which can be unlearned.
Hereditary abilities are permanent. Only acquired abilities may be unlearned.
